Package org.sontana

Class Actor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sontana.Behaviour
      • org.sontana.Pawn
        • org.sontana.Actor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.minueto.handlers.MinuetoKeyboardHandler, org.minueto.handlers.MinuetoMouseHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UIActor
    public class Actor
extends Pawn
implements org.minueto.handlers.MinuetoMouseHandler, org.minueto.handlers.MinuetoKeyboardHandler
    Actor objects are objects in an AbstractScene that are rendered and react to input.
    Author:
    Christophe Simon

      • handleKeyPress

        public final void handleKeyPress​(int value)
        Description copied from interface: org.minueto.handlers.MinuetoKeyboardHandler
        Invoked when a keyboard key is pressed. The identity of the key that was pressed is passed throught the method argument. Events of this type are well suited for the controls of a game.

        The MinuetoKeyboard class stores the constants used to identify the different keys on the keyboard.

        Specified by:
        handleKeyPress in interface org.minueto.handlers.MinuetoKeyboardHandler
        Parameters:
        value - int denoting which key was pressed.
        See Also:
        MinuetoKeyboard

      • handleKeyRelease

        public final void handleKeyRelease​(int value)
        Description copied from interface: org.minueto.handlers.MinuetoKeyboardHandler
        Invoked when a keyboard key is released. The identity of the key that was released is passed throught the method argument. Events of this type are well suited for the controls of a game.

        The MinuetoKeyboard class stores the constants used to identify the different keys on the keyboard.

        Specified by:
        handleKeyRelease in interface org.minueto.handlers.MinuetoKeyboardHandler
        Parameters:
        value - int denoting which key was released.
        See Also:
        MinuetoKeyboard

      • handleKeyType

        public final void handleKeyType​(char keyChar)
        Description copied from interface: org.minueto.handlers.MinuetoKeyboardHandler
        Invoked when a keyboard key was typed. The identity of the key that was released is passed throught the method argument. Events of this type are well suited for typing text.

        Specified by:
        handleKeyType in interface org.minueto.handlers.MinuetoKeyboardHandler
        Parameters:
        keyChar - char denoting the key in this event.
        See Also:
        MinuetoKeyboard

      • handleMousePress

        public final void handleMousePress​(int x,
                                   int y,
                                   int button)
        Description copied from interface: org.minueto.handlers.MinuetoMouseHandler
        Invoked when a mouse button is pressed. The current position of the mouse pointer (relative to the window) and the identity of the button are passed throught the method arguments.

        The MinuetoMouse class stores the constants used to identify the mouse buttons.

        Specified by:
        handleMousePress in interface org.minueto.handlers.MinuetoMouseHandler
        Parameters:
        x - int denoting the X position of the mouse.
        y - int denoting the Y position of the mouse.
        button - int denoting which button was pressed.
        See Also:
        MinuetoMouse

      • handleMouseRelease

        public final void handleMouseRelease​(int x,
                                     int y,
                                     int button)
        Description copied from interface: org.minueto.handlers.MinuetoMouseHandler
        Invoked when a mouse button is released. The current position of the mouse pointer (relative to the window) and the identity of the button are passed throught the method arguments.

        The MinuetoMouse class stores the constants used to identify the mouse buttons.

        Specified by:
        handleMouseRelease in interface org.minueto.handlers.MinuetoMouseHandler
        Parameters:
        x - int denoting the X position of the mouse.
        y - int denoting the Y position of the mouse.
        button - int denoting which button was released.
        See Also:
        MinuetoMouse

      • handleMouseMove

        public final void handleMouseMove​(int x,
                                  int y)
        Description copied from interface: org.minueto.handlers.MinuetoMouseHandler
        Invoked when the mouse cursor is moved. The current position of the mouse pointer (relative to the window) are passed throught the method arguments.

        This method is invoked very often when the mouse is moved. To avoid performance impacts, avoid having expensive (slow) code in this method.

        Specified by:
        handleMouseMove in interface org.minueto.handlers.MinuetoMouseHandler
        Parameters:
        x - int denoting the X position of the mouse.
        y - int denoting the Y position of the mouse.
        See Also:
        MinuetoMouse
